alert.note: Alert for Northern Hancock; Northern Harrison; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 7:10PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Harrison and east central Hancock Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 710 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Diamondhead, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Long Beach, Bay St. Louis, Diamondhead, Lyman, Shoreline Park, Kiln and Gulfport Airport. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 12 and 37. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southern Mississippi.

area.areaDesc: Northern Hancock; Northern Harrison; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison
